title: Serpent talisman
data:
***Version [0.31](/0.31 "0.31")**: This article **may not be** up to date for the [latest stable release](/0.32 "0.32") of Crawl.*

|   |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        |
| - | -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
|   | A jade snake coiled around a nagaraja's name-day egg. Transforms the user into a giant, cold-blooded, poison-resistant serpent, ready to wind their coils around foes and crush them to death. Shapeshifting skill increases the armour provided by the snake's scales. While transformed, any equipped weapons and armour are melded. |

[![Serpent talisman.png](/images/f/f6/Serpent_talisman.png)](/File:Serpent_talisman.png) A **serpent talisman** is a [talisman](/Talisman "Talisman") that changes you into **Serpent Form**, a giant, [constricting](/Constrict "Constrict") snake.

## Contents

- [1 Useful Info](#Useful_Info)
- [2 Strategy](#Strategy)
  - [2.1 Tips & Tricks](#Tips_.26_Tricks)
- [3 History](#History)

## Useful Info

When e**V**oked, this talisman turns you into Serpent Form, which lasts until you end the form. Entering or exiting a form takes 5 turns.

Serpent Form has the following effects:

**Combat Bonuses**

- **HP Bonus:** 120% HP

- **Innate AC:** Linearly scales from the following points, rounding down:

  - Below minimum: 1 AC (0 skill) - 9 AC (10 skill)
  - Above minimum: 9 AC (10 skill) - 15 AC (19 skill) ; +1 AC per 1.67 levels

- **[Unarmed Combat](/Unarmed_Combat "Unarmed Combat"):** 10 base damage.

- **[Constriction](/Constriction "Constriction"):** When making a melee attack, you initiate [constriction](/Constriction "Constriction"). You can constrict 1 [large](/Large "Large") (or smaller) foe at a time.

- **[Stat Bonus](/Strength "Strength"):** +5 strength.

**Resistances**

- [rPois](/Poison_resistance "Poison resistance")

**Restrictions**

- **[Melded Gear](/Transformation#Useful_Info "Transformation"):** All [armour](/Armour "Armour"), [weapon](/Weapon "Weapon") and [shield](/Shield "Shield"). (Can only wear [jewellery](/Jewellery "Jewellery"))
- You cannot [throw](/Throw "Throw") items.

**Other**

- **[Cold-blooded](/Cold-blooded "Cold-blooded"):** You will be [slowed](/Slow "Slow") when hit by certain cold attacks. Negated by any amount of [cold resistance](/Cold_resistance "Cold resistance").
- **[Amphibious](/Amphibious "Amphibious"):** Can swim in [water](/Water "Water"), immune to [drowning](/Drowning "Drowning") damage. Note that, unless your species is already amphibious, you can't recover items in [deep water](/Deep_water "Deep water").
- Serpent Form is **[large](/Large "Large")**-sized. Species smaller than large will have reduced [EV](/EV "EV") in this form. (Being large also lets you constrict large opponents)
- Suppresses many [mutations](/Mutation "Mutation"). Species [movement delay](/Movement_delay "Movement delay") set to 1.0.

Serpent Form has a minimum [Shapeshifting](/Shapeshifting "Shapeshifting") skill of 10, below which you get an [HP penalty](/Talisman#Skill "Talisman"), and the AC bonus scales down. It has a maximum skill of 19, where skill has no further impact.

## Strategy

Constriction is a very strong effect. It reduces enemy [EV](/EV "EV") by *at least* 50% and deals extra damage. Unlike base [Octopodes](/Octopode "Octopode"), Serpent Form can constrict [large](/Large "Large") creatures, including things like [centaurs](/List_of_centaurs "List of centaurs"), [yaks](/Yak "Yak"), and [hydras](/Hydra "Hydra").

Serpent Form also gives a fair bit of AC. For many characters first entering [the Lair](/The_Lair "The Lair"), it offers slightly more AC than lighter armours, without the [encumbrance](/Encumbrance "Encumbrance") of heavy armour. When combined with the 120% HP, it's a moderately durable form. However, the lack of [shield](/Shield "Shield") will reduce your defense in the long run.

### Tips & Tricks

- This form can be very useful for [Nagas](/Naga "Naga") (fittingly enough), as it lets them move at normal speed. [Barachim](/Barachim "Barachim") can also move normally, though they'll lose their hop.
- Being cold-blooded can be risky when fighting monsters with [freezing](/Freezing "Freezing") weapons or other types of cold damage. Note what activates cold-blooded and what doesn't; e.g. certain spells like [Flash Freeze](/Flash_Freeze "Flash Freeze") won't cause the mutation to activate.

## History

- Serpent talismans were introduced in [0.31](/0.31 "0.31"), along with talismans themselves. Serpent Form had no previous counterpart, but is similar in role to [Ice Form](/Ice_Form "Ice Form").

|                                   | [Transformations](/Transformation "Transformation")                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               |
| --------------------------------- | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| [Talisman](/Talisman "Talisman")  | [Beast Form](/Beast_Form "Beast Form") • [Flux Form](/Flux_Form "Flux Form") • [Blade Form](/Blade_Form "Blade Form") • [Maw Form](/Maw_Form "Maw Form") • [Serpent Form](/Serpent_Form "Serpent Form") • [Dragon Form](/Dragon_Form "Dragon Form") • [Statue Form](/Statue_Form "Statue Form") • [Death Form](/Death_Form "Death Form") • [Storm Form](/Storm_Form "Storm Form") |
| [Bad Forms](/Bad_Form "Bad Form") | [Bat Form](/Bat_Form "Bat Form") • [Fungus Form](/Fungus_Form "Fungus Form") • [Pig Form](/Pig_Form "Pig Form") • [Tree Form](/Tree_Form "Tree Form") • [Wisp Form](/Wisp_Form "Wisp Form")                                                                                                                                                                                       |
| [Divine](/God "God")              | [Shadow Form](/Shadow_Form "Shadow Form")                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         |
html:
Serpent talisman

From CrawlWiki
Jump to: navigation, search
Version 0.31: This article may not be up to date for the latest stable release of Crawl.
A jade snake coiled around a nagaraja's name-day egg. Transforms the user into a giant, cold-blooded, poison-resistant serpent, ready to wind their coils around foes and crush them to death. Shapeshifting skill increases the armour provided by the snake's scales. While transformed, any equipped weapons and armour are melded.

A serpent talisman is a talisman that changes you into Serpent Form, a giant, constricting snake.

Contents

  • 1 Useful Info
  • 2 Strategy
    • 2.1 Tips & Tricks
  • 3 History

Useful Info

When eVoked, this talisman turns you into Serpent Form, which lasts until you end the form. Entering or exiting a form takes 5 turns.

Serpent Form has the following effects:

Combat Bonuses

  • HP Bonus: 120% HP
  • Innate AC: Linearly scales from the following points, rounding down:
    • Below minimum: 1 AC (0 skill) - 9 AC (10 skill)
    • Above minimum: 9 AC (10 skill) - 15 AC (19 skill) ; +1 AC per 1.67 levels
  • Unarmed Combat: 10 base damage.
  • Constriction: When making a melee attack, you initiate constriction. You can constrict 1 large (or smaller) foe at a time.
  • Stat Bonus: +5 strength.

Resistances

  • rPois

Restrictions

  • Melded Gear: All armour, weapon and shield. (Can only wear jewellery)
  • You cannot throw items.

Other

  • Cold-blooded: You will be slowed when hit by certain cold attacks. Negated by any amount of cold resistance.
  • Amphibious: Can swim in water, immune to drowning damage. Note that, unless your species is already amphibious, you can't recover items in deep water.
  • Serpent Form is large-sized. Species smaller than large will have reduced EV in this form. (Being large also lets you constrict large opponents)
  • Suppresses many mutations. Species movement delay set to 1.0.

Serpent Form has a minimum Shapeshifting skill of 10, below which you get an HP penalty, and the AC bonus scales down. It has a maximum skill of 19, where skill has no further impact.

Strategy

Constriction is a very strong effect. It reduces enemy EV by at least 50% and deals extra damage. Unlike base Octopodes, Serpent Form can constrict large creatures, including things like centaurs, yaks, and hydras.

Serpent Form also gives a fair bit of AC. For many characters first entering the Lair, it offers slightly more AC than lighter armours, without the encumbrance of heavy armour. When combined with the 120% HP, it's a moderately durable form. However, the lack of shield will reduce your defense in the long run.

Tips & Tricks

  • This form can be very useful for Nagas (fittingly enough), as it lets them move at normal speed. Barachim can also move normally, though they'll lose their hop.
  • Being cold-blooded can be risky when fighting monsters with freezing weapons or other types of cold damage. Note what activates cold-blooded and what doesn't; e.g. certain spells like Flash Freeze won't cause the mutation to activate.

History

  • Serpent talismans were introduced in 0.31, along with talismans themselves. Serpent Form had no previous counterpart, but is similar in role to Ice Form.
Transformations
Talisman Beast Form • Flux Form • Blade Form • Maw Form • Serpent Form • Dragon Form • Statue Form • Death Form • Storm Form
Bad Forms Bat Form • Fungus Form • Pig Form • Tree Form • Wisp Form
Divine Shadow Form

Shapeshifting skill increases the armour provided by the snake's scales. While transformed, any equipped weapons and armour are melded.}}
[[File:serpent talisman.png]] A '''serpent talisman''' is a [[talisman]] that changes you into '''Serpent Form''', a giant, [[constrict]]ing snake.

==Useful Info==
When e'''V'''oked, this talisman turns you into Serpent Form, which lasts until you end the form. Entering or exiting a form takes 5 turns.

Serpent Form has the following effects:

'''Combat Bonuses'''
*'''HP Bonus:''' 120% HP
*'''Innate AC:''' Linearly scales from the following points, rounding down:
**Below minimum: 1 AC (0 skill) - 9 AC (10 skill)
**Above minimum: 9 AC (10 skill) - 15 AC (19 skill) ; +1 AC per 1.67 levels
*'''[[Unarmed Combat]]:''' 10 base damage.
*'''[[Constriction]]:''' When making a melee attack, you initiate [[constriction]]. You can constrict 1 [[large]] (or smaller) foe at a time.
*'''[[Strength|Stat Bonus]]:''' +5 strength.

'''Resistances'''
*[[Poison resistance|rPois]]

'''Restrictions'''
*'''[[Transformation#Useful Info|Melded Gear]]:''' All [[armour]], [[weapon]] and [[shield]]. (Can only wear [[jewellery]])
*You cannot [[throw]] items.

'''Other'''
*'''[[Cold-blooded]]:''' You will be [[slow]]ed when hit by certain cold attacks. Negated by any amount of [[cold resistance]].
*'''[[Amphibious]]:''' Can swim in [[water]], immune to [[drowning]] damage. Note that, unless your species is already amphibious, you can't recover items in [[deep water]].
*Serpent Form is '''[[large]]'''-sized. Species smaller than large will have reduced [[EV]] in this form. (Being large also lets you constrict large opponents)
*Suppresses many [[mutation]]s. Species [[movement delay]] set to 1.0.

Serpent Form has a minimum [[Shapeshifting]] skill of 10, below which you get an [[Talisman#Skill|HP penalty]], and the AC bonus scales down. It has a maximum skill of 19, where skill has no further impact.

==Strategy==
Constriction is a very strong effect. It reduces enemy [[EV]] by ''at least'' 50% and deals extra damage. Unlike base [[Octopode]]s, Serpent Form can constrict [[large]] creatures, including things like [[list of centaurs|centaurs]], [[yak]]s, and [[hydra]]s. 

Serpent Form also gives a fair bit of AC. For many characters first entering [[the Lair]], it offers slightly more AC than lighter armours, without the [[encumbrance]] of heavy armour. When combined with the 120% HP, it's a moderately durable form. However, the lack of [[shield]] will reduce your defense in the long run.

===Tips & Tricks===
*This form can be very useful for [[Naga]]s (fittingly enough), as it lets them move at normal speed. [[Barachim]] can also move normally, though they'll lose their hop.
*Being cold-blooded can be risky when fighting monsters with [[freezing]] weapons or other types of cold damage. Note what activates cold-blooded and what doesn't; e.g. certain spells like [[Flash Freeze]] won't cause the mutation to activate.

==History==
*Serpent talismans were introduced in [[0.31]], along with talismans themselves. Serpent Form had no previous counterpart, but is similar in role to [[Ice Form]].
